pages.text: Takes damage the deeper you submerge in water along with reducing breath
pages.title: Abyssal Crush

pages.text:
To counterract the crushing effects, It is adviced to suit up with Diving Gear. Each increasing the ammount of reduction 
(IF CREATE IS PRESENT) Create Diving Gear is a viable alternative to such,at the cost of slow movement native to the armor
Deep Ones will affect player reputation, depending on whether promoting or destroying the ecosystem
pages.title: Ecological Reputation

pages.text:
Mine Guardians can be created which will cause them to not attack their creators 
 Make sure to be near when creating them alone
pages.title: Remineding

pages.name: Noon Guardian
pages.text: Rename a mine guardian 'Noon' for a Noon Guardian in reference to the Head Artist of Alexs Caves
(REQUIRES REMINEDING) Arm owned mine guardians with a nuclear bomb to make nuclear mine guardians,Refer to the next page for the naming of specific skins
pages.title: Nuclear Warfare
